page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: The Parish of Holy Cross, Goodnestone. For the first time the Parish no longer has a resident Priest and the Parsonage has been sold. The last resident incumbent, Rev. Phillip Pennant, cared for Goodnestone, Chillenden with Knowlton and Adisham. The Sheffield report, published some years ago, deals with manning levels. It's recommendations meant that the Deanery of East Bridge needed to shed two clergy, so Adisham joined another Parish in 1984 on the retirement of Rev. Pennant. The Rev. Ian Hawkins was offered the post for the benefice of Nonington with Wymyms Wold and Goodnestone with Chillenden and Knowlton which came into being on 1st November 1985.
